name: Football on Internet Ground
description: Football on Internet Ground is an NFT GameFi project built on Binance Smart Chain and designed as a bridge between football fans and crypto users. FIG is the native token of the ecosystem that has utility features. Gamers can create teams with their NFTs and earn FIG tokens by predicting results and entering FIG Competitions. FIG is burned every month on a schedule to reduce the supply of tokens and provide deflation.
